nml_option.name: config_use_dyeTracers
nml_option.description: if true, the 'dyeGRP' category is enabled for the run

nml_option.name: config_use_dyeTracers_surface_bulk_forcing
nml_option.description: if true, surface bulk forcing from coupler is added to surfaceTracerFlux in 'dyeGRP' category

nml_option.name: config_use_dyeTracers_surface_restoring
nml_option.description: if true, surface restoring source is applied to tracers in 'dyeGRP' category

nml_option.name: config_use_dyeTracers_interior_restoring
nml_option.description: if true, interior restoring source is applied to tracers in 'dyeGRP' category

nml_option.name: config_use_dyeTracers_exponential_decay
nml_option.description: if true, exponential decay source is applied to tracers in 'dyeGRP' category

nml_option.name: config_use_dyeTracers_idealAge_forcing
nml_option.description: if true, idealAge forcing source is applied to tracers in 'dyeGRP' category

nml_option.name: config_use_dyeTracers_ttd_forcing
nml_option.description: if true, transit time distribution forcing source is applied to tracers in 'dyeGRP' category

package.name: dyeTracersPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required to include dyeGRP.

package.name: dyeTracersBulkRestoringPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required to compute bulk restoring on the dye tracer group.

package.name: dyeTracersSurfaceRestoringPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required to compute surface restoring on the dye tracer group.

package.name: dyeTracersInteriorRestoringPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required to compute interior restoring on the dye tracer group.

package.name: dyeTracersExponentialDecayPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required to compute exponential decay on the dye tracer group.

package.name: dyeTracersIdealAgePKG
package.description: This package includes variables required to compute ideal age forcing on the dye tracer group.

package.name: dyeTracersTTDPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required to compute transit-time distribution forcing on the dye tracer group.

var.name: dyeVolBarentsIdealAgeMask
var.description: In top layer, dyeVolBarents is reset to dyeVolBarents * dyeVolBarentsIdealAgeMask, valid values of dyeVolBarentsIdealAgeMask or 0 and 1

var.name: dyeSaltBarentsIdealAgeMask
var.description: In top layer, dyeSaltBarents is reset to dyeSaltBarents * dyeSaltBarentsIdealAgeMask, valid values of dyeSaltBarentsIdealAgeMask or 0 and 1

var.name: dyeVolBeringIdealAgeMask
var.description: In top layer, dyeVolBering is reset to dyeVolBering * dyeVolBeringIdealAgeMask, valid values of dyeVolBeringIdealAgeMask or 0 and 1

var.name: dyeVolFuryHeclaIdealAgeMask
